item.title: nikolatodoric.com
item.description:
The goal: Make a simple website to where people can get to know me, and learn about my ongoing projects.
The technology: Created using Jekyll. Hosted on GitHub pages.
The result: Most success!Really though, pretty solid.
View source code.

item.title: Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing
item.description:
Intention: Explore the possibilities of implementing a Decentralized Peer to Peer File Sharing system via the Chord algorithm.
Authored by: G. Emanuel, T. Fraser, E. Kemp and F. Todoric
Read the paper here.
